description.para: Allocates indicated length memory space for the string again, initialized with sz and releases the original memory space allocated for the string.

param_note.para: The EzStr, which already has memory space
The number in character to be allocated.

return.para: If succeed, S_OK is returned; Otherwise E_FAIL is returned.

remarks.para: If cch is lesser than the actual length of the string, then the substring which is beyond cch is deleted; If cch is 0, then a pointer points to an empty string is returned.

manpage.result: Before change,str1 is: Hello, world! call ReAllocStringLen (cch=15),str1 is: Now,world,hello
